text: Elfe Gerhart (1919–2007) was an Austrian stage and film actress.Fritsche p.232 She was married to the actor Paul Dahlke, and is sometimes known as Elfe Gerhart-Dahlke. ==Selected filmography== * Finale (1938) * Konzert in Tirol (1938) * Arlberg Express (1948) * Mysterious Shadows (1949) * Request Concert (1955) * All the Sins of the Earth (1958) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Fritsche, Maria. Homemade Men In Postwar Austrian Cinema: Nationhood, Genre and Masculinity . Berghahn Books, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1919 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Austrian film actresses Category:Austrian stage actresses Category:Actresses from Vienna
title: Elfe Gerhart
